snippet.title: Mysterious Island trailer 1
snippet.description:
The storm appeared suddenly, tossing Robin's ship against sharp cliffs.
Shipwrecked and lucky to be alive, he finds himself on the beach of a mysterious island inhabited by strange friends...and enemies. Now, to find a way home, he must explore, make allies and master the mysteries of his new surroundings. Crazy Island offers a unique mix of adventure, role-playing and real-time strategy, with control of up to 5 characters. Danger lurks around every corner, as well as adventure. Are you ready to discover if the last of the dragons really lives somewhere in the islands?



PC iPad i Phone Android Adventure Game.

more info:
www.frost3d.com
